feed.title: Docmost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Docmost: v0.20.1
entry.content:
Following the release of public page sharing in v0.20.0, we making some improvements to the feature based on user feedback.

The improvements in public page sharing includes: - Search - Preserving the page tree ordering - Showing page icons in the tree - Removing comment marks - Fixing the sidebar toggle bug on mobile

What's Changed

  • feat: enhance public sharing by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1057

Full Changelog: https://github.com/docmost/docmost/compare/v0.20.0...v0.20.1

entry.title: New release for Docmost: v0.20.2
entry.content: This is a minor release to fix the mobile sidebar toggle bug reported in #1074.

entry.title: New release for Docmost: v0.20.3
entry.content:
In this minor release, we fixed the page export bug reported here https://github.com/docmost/docmost/issues/1080.

What's Changed

  • fix: page export with sub-pages by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1081

Full Changelog: https://github.com/docmost/docmost/compare/v0.20.2...v0.20.3

entry.title: New release for Docmost: v0.20.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: copy page to different space by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1118
  • fix SSO URL text-case
  • fix: handle unhandled exceptions by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1116

Full Changelog: https://github.com/docmost/docmost/compare/v0.20.3...v0.20.4

entry.title: New release for Docmost: v0.21.0
entry.content:
Highlights

  • Zip imports (import MD/HTML + attachments)
  • Notion import
  • Confluence import (Enterprise Edition)
  • Generic iframe embed
  • Read and edit mode preference
  • Create new page from @ mention
  • Table menu options to toggle table header row and column
  • Persistent excalidraw libraries
  • Fix safari popup link bug in the editor
  • Ukrainian translation
  • Other bug fixes and improvements

Screenshots

Imports

Read and Edit Mode Preference

Create new pages on the fly from @ mentions

Toggle table header row and column

What's Changed

  • Fix typo in enforce-sso.tsx by @edo0 in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1145
  • [Issue-1091] fix alignment in shared page by @fuscodev in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1123
  • fix: title update by @fuscodev in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1154
  • feat: realtime comments by @fuscodev in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1144
  • fix: Copy/move pages between spaces does not show spaces list by @fuscodev in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1174
  • fix(table-hover): adjust height to prevent unexpected scrollbar by @PolarWS in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1124
  • feat: create new page from mention by @fuscodev in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1153
  • feat: comment editor emoji picker and ctrl+enter action by @fuscodev in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1121
  • cloud: add second plan by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1187
  • hide shared page branding in EE by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1193

  • 1186/chore: add support language abap syntax highlight by @sanua356 in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1188

  • fix: sidebar list when changing workspace by @fuscodev in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1150
  • feat: bulk page imports by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1219
  • feat: toggle table header row and column by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1203
  • feat: generic iframe embed by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1234
  • feat: enhance excalidraw by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1240
  • fix: make link popup work on safari by @chaitanyya in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1243
  • chore: upgrade packages by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1242
  • New Crowdin updates by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1063
  • feat: ukrainian language support by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1250
  • fix: revert tiptap version by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1255
  • fix: enforce SSO in invitation signups by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1258
  • remove workspace field in signup (cloud) by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1265
  • feat: edit mode preference by @fuscodev in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/666

New Contributors

  • @edo0 made their first contribution in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1145
  • @PolarWS made their first contribution in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1124
  • @chaitanyya made their first contribution in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/1243

Full Changelog: https://github.com/docmost/docmost/compare/v0.20.4...v0.21.0
